messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

add mail address domain to manager tuesday march pm add hi intend buy kindly ask add trustworthy senders manger thank march pm make money by next buy dear subscriber remember tip about worth buying right shares more than tenfold under days had privileged information knew big brewing took months find next somewhat similar told about certain upside potential good incorporated symbol verge acquired by large drone maker competitor march next going special announced take share price under over dollar overnight specializes manufacturing high specialized drones real automated dispatching coverage by companies way miniature drones which gather military investigators cutting edge changing forefront which acquired share price about ballistic everyone buy right keep low much possible
